Articles.Content:
When I try to launch a rocket into orbit using mechjeb it carries on going straight during the gravity turn and any other times when it should be turning. SAS also has the same problem. This happens most of the time but sometimes enabling navball guidance fixes it.

I use CKAN and the mods below.

**mod list/game info:**

KSP: 0.90 (Win32) - Unity: 4.5.5f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

USI Tools - 0.3.2

Chatterer - 0.8.1.86

CIT - CIT\_Util - 1.2.1

CIT - ActiveStruts - 1.1.1

CIT - BAM - 1.1.1

CIT - ChopIt - 2.6.1

Community Resource Pack - 0.3.3

Editor Extensions - 2.5

RasterPropMonitor - 0.19

Advanced Fly-By-Wire - 1.5.1

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

Neophyte's Elementary Aerodynamics Replacement - 1.3.1

Final Frontier - 0.6.5.697

QuickExit - 1.2.1

QuickSearch - 1.1

RealChute - 1.3

Regolith - 0.1.7

SCANsat - 1.1

Ship Manifest - 0.0

SmartParts - 1.5.1

SmartStage - 2.5

TextureReplacer - 2.2.6

ThrottleControlledAvionics - 2.1

TAC Life Support - 0.10.2.15

Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.2.3

TweakScale - 1.52.1

USI Exploration Pack - 0.3.1

Karbonite - 0.5.5

Karbonite Plus - 0.3

MKS - 0.22.8

USI Alcubierre Drive - 0.1.2

Universal Storage - 1.0.90.2
